descriptionHtml:
Hello! Namea here with my second upload. Again it's a preset since I'm not particularly competent at creating mods for Skyrim yet! As I mentioned in my Saicar download the presets here on the Nexus mostly contain pretty white people. That's fine and dandy but I love to play the beast races! Khajiit and Argonians are in my humble opinion very neglected in the modding community. So, I give you my current Khajiit character in the hopes that she'll get to enjoy some new adventures in your game! 
[b][font=Times New Roman][size=3]
Required Mod:
[/size][/font][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] - by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978
[/url]If you plan on using her as a base and all that jazz that's all ya need!

[b][size=3]Mods for exact match:[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56623/?]SC - Khajiit improvement[/url] - by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6565535]ShinglesCat[/url] 
You can use any Khajiit mod for her, CoverKhajiits looks great too! 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30823/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D30823%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Hale Iridium Eyes[/url] by - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2088150]Halendia
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSky Hair[/url] - By [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148]apachii
[/url]
[b][size=3]Installation:[/size][/b]
I know most people are well-versed in this. If you are please feel free to skip it and hum merrily. For those who need a refresher however:
- Download manually and unpack with your choice of unzipping software. I recommend 7zip but that's just me.
- Place the "DaroSashima.Jslot" file into your Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/Chargen/Presets folder. If you do not have one you can safely create one. 
- Go in-game and either start a new game or type "Showracemenu" into the console. The character creation menu will pop up. Choose the "Presets" tab then choose "Load Preset" and choose Daro-Sashima from the list. You MUST be set to the Khajiit race or odd things can happen!

[center][img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v333/snakeflame/Skyrim/Darohi.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][size=3]Mods used in Screenies[/size][/b]
- UNP body
- SC-Khajiit improvement
- Immersive Jewelry
- VS Witcher 3 Triss Recolors
- Tons of texture mods. If you wanna know just ask!

[b][size=3]ENB:[/size][/b]
Realvision for Climates of Tamriel 5 - Fantasy edition
Immersive Saturation Boost (To add more colour)

[b]I'd love to see your pictures of her in your game![/b]
author: Namea
